name: Hyper Miner (Trijam#81)
description:
Took me 4 hours though. It was real fun and I lvoed the experience because it was an amazing way to make myself actually publish stuff. Being a programmer myself, I set art & sound aside for the sake of speed. I will try to update the game in the upcoming weeks. I spent all saturday coming up with ideas, taking notes and researching the functions/components to make the game playable.

How to Play: My game for my second game jam!: TriJam#81, the 3 hour game jam!
Use your mouse and click to a point to dash and mine all the asteroids on the way. 

  • Score lots of points by mining many asteroids in one movement.
  • Keep an eye for fuel cells! (blue)
  •  Beware Anomalies! (red)
  • Hope you like it!

Author: andres.pablo_94 @instagram - AKA Tybex on Steam

What I would improve

  • Performance. Had to use lots of dirty tricks to make it fast!
  • Appeal. Add some simple SFX and background music.
  • Make new Anomalies or make them more interesting (gravity, extra fuel use, etc)
